attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2014-0956

Date: 2014-09-18

Whereas the Honourable Brian C. Midwinter, a Judge of Her Majesty’s Court of Queen’s Bench for Manitoba, has become afflicted with a permanent infirmity disabling him from the due execution of his office and has tendered his resignation;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice,

 

(a) accepts the resignation of the Honourable Brian C. Midwinter; and

 

(b) pursuant to paragraph 42(1)(c) of the Judges Act, grants to the Honourable Brian C. Midwinter an annuity of $200,533.33, commencing on the date of this Order and continuing during his life.


Attendu que l’honorable Brian C. Midwinter, juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine du Manitoba, a donné sa démission pour incapacité par suite d’une infirmité permanente,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil :

 

a) accepte la démission de l’honorable Brian C. Midwinter;

 

b) en vertu de l’alinéa 42(1)c) de la Loi sur les juges, accorde à l’honorable Brian C. Midwinter, à titre viager, une pension annuelle de 200 533,33 $, payable à compter de la date du présent décret.
attachmentText:
PC Number: 2014-0956Date: 2014-09-18


Whereas the Honourable Brian C. Midwinter, a Judge of Her Majesty’s Court of Queen’s Bench for Manitoba, has become afflicted with a permanent infirmity disabling him from the due execution of his office and has tendered his resignation;


 


Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, 


 


(a) accepts the resignation of the Honourable Brian C. Midwinter; and


 


(b) pursuant to paragraph 42(1)(c) of the Judges Act, grants to the Honourable Brian C. Midwinter an annuity of $200,533.33, commencing on the date of this Order and continuing during his life.



Attendu que l’honorable Brian C. Midwinter, juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine du Manitoba, a donné sa démission pour incapacité par suite d’une infirmité permanente,


 


À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil :


 


a) accepte la démission de l’honorable Brian C. Midwinter;


 


b) en vertu de l’alinéa 42(1)c) de la Loi sur les juges, accorde à l’honorable Brian C. Midwinter, à titre viager, une pension annuelle de 200 533,33 $, payable à compter de la date du présent décret.
